name: Super Diamond Escape
description:
Super Diamond Escape

Play as a sentient diamond and escape to become human and find true love. Created for ScoreSpace Jam #1: Thievery. Rather than stealing something, you are the thing being stolen.

The game features a new online highscore system. Set your name using U and compete with others!

No HTML build due bug with export.

Controls

- Use Mouse for aiming and LMB to dash. Recommended to use Gamepad with Right Bumper RB as dash.

- Press X to go back to the main screen.

- Press R to go back to last checkpoint. Or X button for Gamepads.

- Press U to change username in leaderboards.
